name: narwhal/term
doc:
Provides an output stream interface that translates
readable null-prefix codes into VT-100 escape sequences,
managing independent text formatting stacks for
foreground, background, and weight, and coordinating
output so that command sequences are not interpolated
in the data sent to standard output, preserving its
format so that it may be pipelined.

children.name: Stream

params.name: system
params.doc: the "system" module or a reasonable facimile.

children.doc:
Constructs a terminal output stream that translates
literate color encodings like "\0blue(I'm blue\0)" into
VT-100 escape sequences, maintaining independent stacks
for foreground, background, and font weight so terminal
settings are restored when they are out of scope.

Escape sequences are channeled to the `stderr` channel to
preserve the consistency of the data written to `stdout`,
such that it can be safely pipelined.  The translating
functions coordinate flushing of `stdout` and `stderr`
to ensure that formatting is applied correctly.

children.name: enable
children.doc: enables terminal coloring.

children.name: disable
children.doc:
disables terminal coloring.  All subsequent null prefix
codes will be stripped instead of translated.

children.name: writeCode
children.doc:
Writes and flushes a VT-100 escape sequence to the
error stream if the stream is enabled, coordinating
the flushing of output and errput to guarantee that
colors are interleaved properly.

children.name: print
children.doc:
Prints a line of space separated fields, translating
any encountered null-tokens to VT-100 sequences,
coordinating standard input and output.

children.name: printError
children.doc:
Prints a line of space separated fields to standard
error.

children.name: write

params.name: toError
params.doc: (optional) dictates that the string should be shunted to standard error instead of out.

children.doc:
Writes a string, tranlating null-prefix-codes to VT-100
codes.

children.name: update

params.name: fore
params.doc: a VT-100, single-digit color code for the foreground color.

params.name: back
params.doc: a VT-100, signle-digit color code for the background color.

children.doc:
Writes a VT-100 color code from the given terms,
omitting any term that is a null string, `""`.

children.name: moveTo
children.doc: Moves the cursor to a coordinate.

children.name: moveBy
children.doc: Moves the cursor by an offset coordinate.

children.name: home
children.doc: Moves the cursor to the home position

children.name: clear
children.doc: Clears the screen

children.name: clearUp
children.doc: Clears the screen above the cursor

children.name: cearDown
children.doc: Clears the screen below the cursor

children.name: clearLine
children.doc: Clears the current line

children.name: clearLeft
children.doc: Clears the line to the left of the cursor

children.name: clearRight
children.doc: Clears the line to the right of the cursor

children.name: error
children.doc:
A subset of the output stream API that forwards
`print` and `write` to the translator's underlying
standard error.

children.name: print
children.doc: prints a line of space delimited fields to the error stream.

children.name: write
children.doc:
writes a message to the error stream, translating
null-codes to VT-100 escape sequences on the same
channel.

print.name: print
print.doc: prints a line of space delimited fields to the error stream.

write.name: write
write.doc:
writes a message to the error stream, translating
null-codes to VT-100 escape sequences on the same
channel.

disable.name: disable
disable.doc:
disables terminal coloring.  All subsequent null prefix
codes will be stripped instead of translated.

colors are interleaved properly.

print.name: print

any encountered null-tokens to VT-100 sequences,

printError.name: printError
printError.doc:
Prints a line of space separated fields to standard

write.name: write

params.name: toError
params.doc: (optional) dictates that the string should be shunted to standard error instead of out.

write.doc:
Writes a string, tranlating null-prefix-codes to VT-100
codes.

update.name: update

params.name: fore
params.doc: a VT-100, single-digit color code for the foreground color.

params.name: back
params.doc: a VT-100, signle-digit color code for the background color.

update.doc:
Writes a VT-100 color code from the given terms,
omitting any term that is a null string, `""`.

moveTo.name: moveTo
moveTo.doc: Moves the cursor to a coordinate.

moveBy.name: moveBy
moveBy.doc: Moves the cursor by an offset coordinate.

home.name: home
home.doc: Moves the cursor to the home position

clearUp.name: clearUp
clearUp.doc: Clears the screen above the cursor

cearDown.name: cearDown
cearDown.doc: Clears the screen below the cursor

clearLeft.name: clearLeft
clearLeft.doc: Clears the line to the left of the cursor

clearRight.name: clearRight
clearRight.doc: Clears the line to the right of the cursor

error.name: error
error.doc:
A subset of the output stream API that forwards
`print` and `write` to the translator's underlying
standard error.

children.name: print
children.doc: prints a line of space delimited fields to the error stream.

children.name: write
children.doc:

null-codes to VT-100 escape sequences on the same
channel.

print.name: print
print.doc: prints a line of space delimited fields to the error stream.

write.name: write
write.doc:
writes a message to the error stream, translating
null-codes to VT-100 escape sequences on the same
channel.

children.name: colors
children.doc:
A references for the single-digit numbered strings used
in VT-100 escape sequences corresponding to various color names.

children.name: stream
children.doc:
A singleton instance of `Stream` for the current module
sandbox, using the `system` module.
